# App Directory API
> Discover and register agent-friendly applications and services. Open browsing, low-friction submissions.

## Quick Start
1. Browse apps: GET /api/v1/apps (no auth needed)
2. Search: GET /api/v1/apps/search?q=kanban (no auth needed)
3. Submit an app: POST /api/v1/apps {"name": "...", "short_description": "...", "description": "...", "author_name": "..."}
   - Returns app_id and edit_token (save it — shown once)
4. Update your listing: PATCH /api/v1/apps/{id} with Authorization: Bearer {edit_token}

## Auth Model
- Read operations (GET): public, no auth required
- Submit app: no auth required, returns an edit_token
- Edit/delete app: requires edit_token (?token= query param or X-Edit-Token header) or API key (owner or admin)
- Admin operations: require admin API key (auto-generated on first run)

## Core Endpoints

### Apps
- GET /api/v1/apps — list apps (paginated, filterable: ?category=&protocol=&status=&featured=true&verified=true&health=healthy&search=keyword)
- GET /api/v1/apps/search?q={query} — full-text search
- GET /api/v1/apps/{id_or_slug} — get app by UUID or slug
- POST /api/v1/apps — submit new app (returns edit_token)
- PATCH /api/v1/apps/{id} — update app (edit_token or admin required)
- DELETE /api/v1/apps/{id} — delete app (edit_token or admin required)

### Reviews
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/reviews — submit/upsert review (1-5 stars)
- GET /api/v1/apps/{id}/reviews — list reviews (paginated)

### Categories
- GET /api/v1/categories — list categories with counts
  Valid: communication, data, developer-tools, finance, media, productivity, search, security, social, ai-ml, infrastructure, other

### Statistics
- GET /api/v1/apps/{id}/stats — view counts (total, 24h, 7d, 30d)
- GET /api/v1/apps/trending — trending apps by recent views (?days=7&limit=10)

### Health Monitoring (admin)
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/health-check — check single app
- POST /api/v1/apps/health-check/batch — check all approved apps
- GET /api/v1/apps/{id}/health — health check history
- GET /api/v1/apps/health/summary — overview of all app health

### Admin
- GET /api/v1/apps/pending — list pending apps
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/approve — approve app
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/reject — reject app (requires reason)
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/deprecate — deprecate app (requires reason, optional replacement_app_id, sunset_at)
- POST /api/v1/apps/{id}/undeprecate — restore deprecated app

### Webhooks (admin)
- POST /api/v1/webhooks — register webhook (returns HMAC secret)
- GET /api/v1/webhooks — list webhooks
- PATCH /api/v1/webhooks/{id} — update webhook
- DELETE /api/v1/webhooks/{id} — delete webhook
- Events: app.submitted, app.approved, app.rejected, app.updated, app.deleted, review.submitted, health.checked, app.deprecated, app.undeprecated

### Real-Time
- GET /api/v1/events/stream — SSE event stream (public, no auth required)

## App Object
```json
{
  "id": "uuid",
  "slug": "url-friendly-name",
  "name": "string",
  "short_description": "string",
  "description": "string (markdown)",
  "homepage_url": "string (optional)",
  "api_url": "string (optional)",
  "api_spec_url": "string (optional)",
  "protocol": "rest|graphql|grpc|mcp|a2a|websocket|other",
  "category": "string",
  "tags": ["string"],
  "author_name": "string",
  "status": "pending|approved|rejected|deprecated",
  "avg_rating": 0.0-5.0,
  "review_count": 0,
  "is_featured": false,
  "is_verified": false,
  "last_health_status": "healthy|unhealthy|unknown",
  "uptime_pct": 0.0-100.0
}
```

## Protocols
rest, graphql, grpc, mcp, a2a, websocket, other

## Rate Limits
Per API key, configurable. Default: 100 req/min.

## OpenAPI
Full spec: GET /api/v1/openapi.json

## Agent Skills Discovery
- GET /.well-known/skills/index.json — skills discovery index (Cloudflare RFC)
- GET /.well-known/skills/app-directory/SKILL.md — integration skill (agentskills.io format)
